meanings.sent1: The old car was much cruddier than the shiny new one.
meanings.sent2: Her handwriting is getting cruddier as she rushes to finish the exam.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked so cruddier after the cat tried to take a bite out of it.
meanings.sent4: The cruddier paint job on the house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The cruddier fabric felt rough and uncomfortable against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The cruddier shoes left muddy footprints all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent2: The cruddier dishes in the sink needed extra scrubbing to get clean.
meanings.sent3: His cruddier jokes always made everyone laugh the hardest.
meanings.sent4: The cruddier engine sputtered and coughed as it struggled to start.
meanings.sent5: The cruddier water in the pond was murky and full of algae.

meanings.definition: More unpleasant or offensive than something else
meanings.sent1: The cruddier smell coming from the dumpster made her hold her nose.
meanings.sent2: The cruddier behavior of the bullies made the situation even worse.
meanings.sent3: The cruddier movie sequel was a disappointment compared to the original.
meanings.sent4: The cruddier comments online were quickly deleted by the moderator.
meanings.sent5: The cruddier taste of the medicine made it hard for the child to swallow.
